english_translation: What you considered today to be the cause of joy.
That same thing may become the cause of trouble tomorrow.

kannada_original: ಸುಖದ ನೆಲೆ ಅದರ ಪರಿ ಯಕ್ಷಿಣಿಯ ಕಣ್ಣಟ್ಟು
english_transliteration: Sukhada nele adara pari yakṣiṇiya kaṇṇaṭṭu
english_translation: The abode of happiness and its nature is like the gaze of a Yakshini (illusion).
Equanimity/balanced outlook is the true quality – Muddu Rama.
